sentences.en: A car swished by heading for the coast.
sentences.cn: 一辆车嗖地驶过朝海岸开去。

sentences.en: By 09.30 we had cast off and were heading down-river.
sentences.cn: 9点30分时我们就解缆向下游出发了。

sentences.en: By dusk we were dog-tired and heading for home.
sentences.cn: 到了傍晚我们累趴下了，于是回家。

sentences.en: He appeared to be heading for a comfortable victory.
He cast off, heading out to the bay.
sentences.cn: 他解开缆绳，往海湾驶去。

sentences.en: He realized that he was heading in the wrong direction.
His career was heading downhill fast.
Hurricane Andrew was last night heading into the Gulf of Mexico.
sentences.cn: 昨晚，飓风“安德鲁”进入了墨西哥湾。

sentences.en: I'm heading for sunnier climes next month.
sentences.cn: 我下个月要去阳光比较明媚的地区。

sentences.en: If the company continues on this course, it's heading for financial trouble.
sentences.cn: 如果公司继续这样下去, 它就会陷入财政困难.

sentences.en: It looks as if the firm is heading for another record year.
sentences.cn: 看来今年公司又要创纪录.

sentences.en: The coach driver made several pickups before heading for the airport.
sentences.cn: 长途汽车开往飞机场之前,司机停了几次搭载乘客.

sentences.en: The crowd is heading eastward, believing that they can find gold there.
sentences.cn: 人群正在向东移去, 他们认为在那里可以找到黄金.

sentences.en: The parson, heading the procession, had just turned right towards the churchyard.
sentences.cn: 走在行进队伍最前面的教区牧师刚刚向右转弯，朝着教堂墓地走去。

sentences.en: They were heading towards the German border.

words.tran_cn: 不在意的；无头脑的；无领导者的
兴奋的；任性的；性急的；顽固的；使人头晕的
头；头痛；上端；最前的部分；理解力
头球；页眉；数据头；收割台
大标题；内容提要；栏外标题；头版头条新闻
写标题的记者；头牌人物
率领（head的过去分词）；朝向；走在…的前头
前进；用头顶；作为…的首领；站在…的前头；给…加标题
给…加标题；使成为注意中心；大力宣传

phrases.tran_cn: 航向角，迎波角；（汽车）方位角；航向改变角
掘进机；顶镦机；螺丝打头机；封头机

trans.tran_cn: 标题，题名，信头，[航]航向，斩首
trans.tran_en: the title written at the beginning of a piece of writing, or at the beginning of part of a book
